sentence1: In contrast to secondary or acquired immune deficiency diseases caused by infectious, chemical or radiological agents, the primary immunodeficiency diseases are caused by intrinsic dysfunction in the cells of the immune system, often brought about by inherited genetic defects.
sentence2: Exposure to chemical or biological agents can cause an acquired immunodeficiency later in life.
label: entails
